title: Rubio wants "gun violence restraining orders"
text:
Rubio wants "gun violence restraining orders" 6:52pm GMT - 01:39 
Senator Marco Rubio of Florida said on Thursday that he backed restraining orders for gun-owners deemed to be dangerous, as well as funding for measures to train schools to identify warning signs for violence. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Senator Marco Rubio of Florida said on Thursday that he backed restraining orders for gun-owners deemed to be dangerous, as well as funding for measures to train schools to identify warning signs for violence.
